title: Spacious 2 story house for Sale in Palawatte
details:
Gorgeous 5-bedroom, 3-bathroom home in Pelawatta. This property offers 3500 square feet of living space and a land size of 10.5 perches. Your family and loved ones will enjoy the generous space to move about, Perfect for your family! Come and take a look…. Don’t miss out!

Asking price is Rs.30m (negotiable )
